sql.query: select nvl(max(adcfac_sno),0)+1 as facilityid from comadc_facilities where adcfac_appno='^'

insert into comadc_facilities( adcfac_appno ,adcfac_sno ,adcfac_headid ,adcfac_id ,adcfac_group ,adcfac_category ,adcfac_amount ,adcfac_interest , adcfac_margin ,adcfac_os ,adcfac_osason ,adcfac_months ,adcfac_secvalue ,adcfac_remarks ,adcfac_cbsaccno ) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?)
delete from comadc_facilities where adcfac_appno=? and adcfac_sno=?

update comadc_facilities set adcfac_headid=? ,adcfac_id=? ,adcfac_group=? ,adcfac_category=? ,adcfac_amount=? ,adcfac_interest=? , adcfac_margin=? ,adcfac_os=? ,adcfac_osason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') ,adcfac_months=? ,adcfac_secvalue=? ,adcfac_remarks=? ,adcfac_cbsaccno=? where adcfac_appno=? and adcfac_sno=?

select adcfac_appno, adcfac_headid, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=adcfac_headid and facility_parent=0) as facheaddesc, adcfac_id, (select upper(facility_catdesc) from facility_master where facility_catid=adcfac_id and facility_parent!=0) as facdesc, adcfac_amount,adcfac_interest , adcfac_margin ,adcfac_os ,to_char(adcfac_osason,'dd/mm/yyyy') as adcfac_osason ,adcfac_months ,adcfac_secvalue ,adcfac_remarks ,adcfac_cbsaccno , adcfac_group, adcfac_sno,adcfac_category from comadc_facilities where adcfac_appno='^' and adcfac_group='^'
update comadc_facilities set adcfac_osason=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where adcfac_appno=?
select adc_appno, adc_comappid, comapp_companyname, adc_holdusrid, adc_staus, adc_valuesin from comadc_applications, comapplicant where comapp_id=adc_comappid and adc_appno='^'
select nvl(substr(max(adc_appno),7,14),'0') as appno from comadc_applications where substr(adc_appno,1,5) ='^'

insert into comadc_applications ( adc_appno ,adc_appusrid ,adc_createdate ,adc_createorgscode , adc_valuesin ,adc_prdcode ,adc_comappid ,adc_holdusrid ,adc_staus,adc_mailchkstatus) values (?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,'op','N')
select nvl(max(sec_srlno),0)+1 as snomax from comadc_securities where sec_appno='^'

insert into comadc_securities (sec_appno, sec_srlno, sec_id, sec_desc, sec_value, sec_valuedate, sec_type, sec_tenor, sec_valuedby, sec_insamt, sec_insexpdate, sec_remarks,sec_facsno) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)

update comadc_securities set sec_id=?, sec_desc=?, sec_value=?, sec_valuedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), sec_type=?, sec_tenor=?, sec_valuedby=?, sec_insamt=?, sec_insexpdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), sec_remarks=?,sec_facsno=? where sec_appno=? and sec_srlno=?
delete from comadc_securities where sec_appno=? and sec_srlno=?

select sec_appno, sec_srlno, sec_id, sec_desc, sec_value, to_char(sec_valuedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_valuedate, sec_type, sec_tenor, sec_valuedby, sec_insamt, to_char(sec_insexpdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_insexpdate, sec_remarks, stat_data_desc as sec_name,sec_facsno from comadc_securities, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=sec_id and sec_appno='^' order by sec_appno,sec_srlno

select adc_appno, comapp_companyname, adc_staus, adc_holdusrid from comadc_applications, comapplicant, organisations where adc_comappid=comapp_id and org_code like '^' and org_scode=comapp_org_scode and comapp_oldid='^'
select adc_appno from comadc_applications a, comapplicant b where a.adc_comappid= b.comapp_id and upper(a.adc_staus) in (^) and b.comapp_id='^'
select adcfac_sno,facility_catdesc,adcfac_amount from FACILITY_MASTER a, COMADC_FACILITIES b where a.facility_catid= b.adcfac_id and b.adcfac_appno='^'
delete from COMADC_BANKINGDETAILS where ADCBANK_APPNO=?

insert into COMADC_BANKINGDETAILS (adcbank_appno,adcbank_type,adcbank_leadbank,adcbank_asset,adcbank_internalrating,adcbank_reviewduedate, adcbank_externalrating_st,adcbank_externalrating_lt,adcbank_accountstatus,adcbank_propexistfb,adcbank_propproposedfb,adcbank_propexistnfb,adcbank_propproposednfb)values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select adcbank_appno,adcbank_type,adcbank_leadbank,adcbank_asset,adcbank_internalrating,to_char(adcbank_reviewduedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as adcbank_reviewduedate, adcbank_externalrating_st,adcbank_externalrating_lt,adcbank_accountstatus,adcbank_propexistfb,adcbank_propproposedfb,adcbank_propexistnfb,adcbank_propproposednfb from COMADC_BANKINGDETAILS where adcbank_appno='^'
insert into COMADC_GUARANTEECOMMENTS (guarantee_appno,guarntee_comments)values(?,?)
delete from COMADC_GUARANTEECOMMENTS where guarantee_appno=?
select guarantee_appno,guarntee_comments from COMADC_GUARANTEECOMMENTS where guarantee_appno='^'
select adccom_appno,adccom_sanctauth,adccom_valueaccount, adccom_presentreq,adccom_delegatedauth from COMADC_COMMENT where adccom_appno='^'
insert into COMADC_COMMENT (adccom_appno,adccom_sanctauth,adccom_valueaccount, adccom_presentreq,adccom_delegatedauth) values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete from COMADC_COMMENT where adccom_appno=?
insert into COMADC_LIMITCOMMENTS (limitcomm_appno,limitcomments)values(?,?)
delete from COMADC_LIMITCOMMENTS where limitcomm_appno=?
select limitcomm_appno,limitcomments from COMADC_LIMITCOMMENTS where limitcomm_appno='^'

select adcrecom_appno,adcrecom_orglevel,adcrecom_comments,adcrecom_signatures,adcrecom_refno, to_char(adcrecom_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as adcrecom_date from COMADC_RECOMMENDATION where adcrecom_appno='^' and adcrecom_orglevel in (^)
insert into COMADC_RECOMMENDATION(adcrecom_appno,adcrecom_orglevel,adcrecom_comments,adcrecom_signatures) values (?,?,?,?)
delete from COMADC_RECOMMENDATION where adcrecom_appno=? and adcrecom_orglevel=?
delete from COMADC_FINANCIALCOMMENTS where ADCFINCOM_APPNO =?
insert into COMADC_FINANCIALCOMMENTS (ADCFINCOM_APPNO,ADCFINCOM_COMMENTS) values(?,?)
select ADCFINCOM_APPNO,ADCFINCOM_COMMENTS from COMADC_FINANCIALCOMMENTS where ADCFINCOM_APPNO='^'
select adcfin_appno,adcfin_slno,adcfin_pretyear,adcfin_lastyear,adcfin_currentyear,adcfin_nextyear,adcfin_desc from COMADC_FINANCIALS where adcfin_appno ='^' order by adcfin_slno
insert into COMADC_FINANCIALS (ADCFIN_APPNO,ADCFIN_SLNO,ADCFIN_PRETYEAR,ADCFIN_LASTYEAR,ADCFIN_CURRENTYEAR,ADCFIN_NEXTYEAR,ADCFIN_DESC) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from COMADC_FINANCIALS where ADCFIN_APPNO =?

select adcmail_fromusrid||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname as fromuser, adcmail_tousrid||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||' '||usr2.usr_lname as touser,adcmail_fromflowpoint,adcmail_toflowpoint, to_char(adcmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as maildate, adcmail_fromusrid, adcmail_tousrid from comadc_mailbox, users usr1,users usr2 where adcmail_appno like '^' and adcmail_fromusrid=usr1.usr_id and adcmail_tousrid=usr2.usr_id order by adcmail_date
select adc_appno, adc_appusrid, adc_holdusrid, adc_processusrid, adc_sanccomments, adc_staus from COMADC_APPLICATIONS where adc_appno= '^'

select prd_flowpoint, wrk_flowname, prd_maxclass, prd_function,stat_data_desc1 from prd_workflow, workflow, static_data where prd_code=(select adc_prdcode from COMADC_APPLICATIONS where adc_appno='^') and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_flowpoint ^ ^ and prd_workid=wrk_flowid and stat_data_id='7' and stat_data_desc=prd_maxclass order by prd_flowpoint
select count(ADCMAIL_FROMFLOWPOINT) from COMADC_MAILBOX where ADCMAIL_APPNO='^' and ADCMAIL_FROMFLOWPOINT=^

select adcmail_toflowpoint, to_char(adcmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as adcmail_date, to_char(prd_duration+adcmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, prd_maxclass from COMADC_MAILBOX, COMADC_APPLICATIONS, prd_workflow where adcmail_date=(select max(adcmail_date) from COMADC_MAILBOX where adcmail_appno='^') and adcmail_toflowpoint=prd_flowpoint and adcmail_appno=adc_appno and prd_code=adc_prdcode and adc_appno='^'

select prd_maxclass, to_char(adc_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as createdate, to_char(prd_duration+adc_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as duedate from COMADC_APPLICATIONS, prd_workflow where prd_flowpoint=1 and prd_code=adc_prdcode and adc_appno='^'
select prd_skip, prd_approval from prd_authority, COMADC_APPLICATIONS where prd_code=adc_prdcode and adc_appno='^'
insert into COMADC_MAILBOX(adcmail_appno, adcmail_fromusrid, adcmail_tousrid, adcmail_fromflowpoint, adcmail_toflowpoint, adcmail_date) values(?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
update COMADC_APPLICATIONS set adc_holdusrid=?,adc_mailchkstatus='Y' where adc_appno=?
update COMADC_APPLICATIONS set adc_staus=?, adc_processusrid=?, adc_processdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), adc_processorgscode=?, adc_sanccomments=? where adc_appno=?
select max(prd_flowpoint) as maxflowpoint from PRD_WORKFLOW,WORKFLOW,COMADC_APPLICATIONS where prd_workid=wrk_flowid and prd_code=adc_prdcode and wrk_flowtype='p' and adc_appno='^'
update COMADC_APPLICATIONS set adc_staus = concat('c',substr(adc_staus,2,2)), adc_closedate=sysdate where adc_appno=?
insert into COMADC_MAILCOMMENTS (adcmcom_appno, adcmcom_comments, adcmcom_userid, adcmcom_date, adcmcom_touser, adcmcom_pano) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

select adcmcom_appno, adcmcom_comments, adcmcom_userid, to_char(adcmcom_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as adcmcom_date, adcmcom_touser, user_designation, usr_fname, adcmcom_pano from COMADC_MAILCOMMENTS, USERS where adcmcom_appno='^' and adcmcom_userid=usr_id order by adcmcom_date desc

select count(adc_appno) from COMADC_APPLICATIONS, ORGANISATIONS, COMAPPLICANT where comapp_id=adc_comappid and org_scode=adc_createorgscode and adc_holdusrid='^' and upper(adc_staus) not like 'C_' and adc_mailchkstatus='Y'

select ADC_APPNO, comapp_companyname, org_name, ADC_STAUS, ADCMAIL_FROMUSRID, to_char(ADCMAIL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as adcmail_date from comadc_mailbox a, COMADC_APPLICATIONS, comapplicant, organisations where a.ADCMAIL_DATE=(select max(b.ADCMAIL_DATE) from comadc_mailbox b where b.ADCMAIL_APPNO=a.ADCMAIL_APPNO) and a.ADCMAIL_TOUSRID=ADC_HOLDUSRID and a.ADCMAIL_APPNO=ADC_APPNO and comapp_id=ADC_COMAPPID and org_scode=ADC_CREATEORGSCODE and ADC_HOLDUSRID='^' and upper(ADC_STAUS) not like 'C_' and ADC_MAILCHKSTATUS='Y' and ADC_DELFLAG='N'

select adcfac_sno, adcfac_id, (select facility_catdesc from facility_master where facility_catid= adcfac_id) as fac_desc, facility_catdesc as facilityhead from facility_master a,comadc_facilities b where b.adcfac_headid = a.facility_catid and b.adcfac_appno ='^'

select facility_catdesc, adcfac_amount, adcfac_margin, adcfac_interest, adcfac_headid,adcfac_id, adcfac_os, adcfac_secvalue, adcfac_sno,adcfac_category, adcfac_months,adcfac_remarks from FACILITY_MASTER a, COMADC_FACILITIES b where b.adcfac_id = a.facility_catid and b.adcfac_appno ='^' and b.adcfac_headid='^' and adcfac_group=0 order by adcfac_sno

select facility_catdesc, adcfac_amount, adcfac_margin, adcfac_interest, adcfac_headid, adcfac_id, adcfac_os, adcfac_secvalue, adcfac_category,adcfac_months,adcfac_remarks from facility_master a, COMADC_FACILITIES b where b.adcfac_id = a.facility_catid and b.adcfac_appno ='^' and adcfac_group='^' order by adcfac_sno

select sec_appno, sec_srlno, sec_id, sec_desc, sec_value, to_char(sec_valuedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_valuedate, sec_type, sec_tenor, sec_valuedby, sec_insamt, to_char(sec_insexpdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_insexpdate, sec_remarks, stat_data_desc as sec_name,sec_facsno from comadc_securities, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=sec_id and sec_appno='^' and upper(sec_type)=upper('^') order by sec_appno,sec_srlno
select sum(adcfac_amount) as Amount, sum(adcfac_os) as outstanding,sum(adcfac_secvalue) as SECVALUE from COMADC_FACILITIES where adcfac_appno='^' and adcfac_headid='^' and adcfac_group='0'
select to_char(adc_createdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as createdate,adc_valuesin from COMADC_APPLICATIONS where adc_appno='^'

select sec_appno, sec_srlno, sec_id, sec_desc, sec_value, to_char(sec_valuedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_valuedate, sec_type, sec_tenor, sec_valuedby, sec_insamt, to_char(sec_insexpdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sec_insexpdate, sec_remarks, stat_data_desc as sec_name,sec_facsno from comadc_securities, static_data where stat_data_id(+)=12 and stat_data_desc1(+)=sec_id and sec_appno='^' and upper(sec_type)=upper('^') and sec_facsno ='^' order by sec_appno,sec_srlno
update COMADC_RECOMMENDATION set adcrecom_refno=?,adcrecom_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where adcrecom_appno=?
select adcrecom_appno,adcrecom_orglevel,adcrecom_comments,adcrecom_signatures,adcrecom_refno,to_char(adcrecom_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as adcrecom_date from COMADC_RECOMMENDATION where adcrecom_appno='^'

select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid,facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_sno, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, to_char(facility_osason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_osason from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_headid=4 and facility_group=0 and b.facility_existing >0

select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_sno, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, to_char(facility_osason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_osason from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_headid=3 and facility_group=0 and b.facility_existing >0

select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_sno, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, to_char(facility_osason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_osason from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_headid in('1','2') and facility_group=0 and b.facility_existing >0

select sum(facility_existing) as WC_FUNDED_EXISTING, sum(facility_proposed) as WC_FUNDED_PROPOSED from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_headid ='3' and facility_group='0' and facility_existing >0

select sum(facility_existing) as WC_NONFUNDED_EXISTING, sum(facility_proposed) as WC_NONFUNDED_PROPOSED from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_headid ='4' and facility_group='0' and facility_existing >0

select sum(facility_existing) as TL_FUNDED_EXISTING, sum(facility_proposed) as TL_FUNDED_PROPOSED from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_headid='1' and facility_group='0' and facility_existing >0

select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, facility_sno, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, to_char(facility_osason,'DD/MM/YYYY') as facility_osason from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and b.facility_existing =0 and facility_category='A' order by facility_sno

select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, facility_sno from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_group='^' and facility_category='A' and facility_existing=0 order by facility_sno

select facility_catdesc, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_margin, facility_interest, facility_headid, facility_id, facility_dp, facility_outstanding, security_value, facility_desc, bplr, facility_intadjustment, facility_category, facility_months, facility_intremarks, facility_sno from facility_master a, facilities b where b.facility_id = a.facility_catid and b.facility_appno ='^' and facility_group='^' and facility_existing >0 order by facility_sno
select prd_bankscheme from products where PRD_CODE='^'

select PERAPP_NETWORTH,perapp_cbsid,PERAPP_FNAME,perapp_cbsid,perapp_id,perapp_fname,perinc_yearsalary,PERINC_YEAR1_INCOME,perapp_networth, con_appid,con_comaddr1,perapp_employment,perinc_takehome, con_comaddr2,con_comvillage,con_comcity,con_comdist,con_comstate,con_comzip,con_comcountry,perapp_oldid,to_char(PERAPP_NETWORTHASON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as networthason,INDINFO_RESIDENT_STATUS ,CON_PERMADDR1,CON_PERMADDR2,CON_PERMVILLAGE,CON_PERMCITY,CON_PERMDIST,CON_PERMSTATE,CON_PERMZIP,CON_PERMCOUNTRY from cust_contactinfo,perapplicant,perincexpenses,individual_info where con_appid='^' and perapp_id=con_appid and perinc_id=con_appid and INDINFO_APPID=con_appid AND (lower(perapp_renew)='n' or perapp_renew is null)
select BANKER_APPL_NO from BANKERCERTIFICATE where banker_cbs_id='^' and banker_status='PA'
select NVL(max(com_bank_sno),0) as com_bank_sno from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_appno='^'
select NVL(max(com_bank_sno),0) as com_bank_sno from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_appno='^'
select stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_value from static_data where stat_data_id='277' and STAT_DATA_ACTIVE='Y' order by stat_data_desc1
select com_bank_sanstatus,to_char(com_bank_expdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as com_bank_expdate from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_appno='^' and com_bank_sno='^'
select USR_CLASS from USERS where USR_ID='^'
select banker_orgcode from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPL_NO='^'
select BANKER_APPL_NO from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_STATUS in ('PA') and BANKER_APPID='^'
select NVL(max(com_bank_sno),0)+1 as com_bank_sno from com_banking_det_history where com_bank_appno='^'
select state_code,state_name from laps_states where state_name='^'
select city_name,city_code from laps_cities where city_name like '^%'
select district_desc,district_code from district_master where district_desc='^'
select con_country,con_countrycode from countrysetup where con_country='^'

Select to_char(BANKER_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as BANKER_DATE,BANKER_AMOUNT, to_char(BANKER_SANCTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as BANKER_SANCTION_DATE,to_char(Tender_Notification_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as Tender_Notification_date, to_char(CUT_OFF_DATED_SUBMISSION,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CUT_OFF_DATED_SUBMISSION, to_char(Tender_Opening_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as Tender_Opening_date,to_char(Validity_of_Tender,'dd/mm/yyyy')as Validity_of_Tender, to_char(banker_certi_valityextdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as banker_certi_valityextdate ,to_char(BANK_EXPIRY_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as BANK_EXPIRY_DATE , BANK_VALID_DAYS,bank_active_count,bank_active_limit,bank_expire_count,bank_expire_limit from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPL_NO='^'

Select to_char(BANKER_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as BANKER_DATE,BANKER_AMOUNT, to_char(BANKER_SANCTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as BANKER_SANCTION_DATE,to_char(Tender_Notification_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as Tender_Notification_date, to_char(CUT_OFF_DATED_SUBMISSION,'dd/mm/yyyy')as CUT_OFF_DATED_SUBMISSION, to_char(Tender_Opening_date,'dd/mm/yyyy')as Tender_Opening_date,to_char(Validity_of_Tender,'dd/mm/yyyy')as Validity_of_Tender, to_char(banker_certi_valityextdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as banker_certi_valityextdate ,to_char(BANK_EXPIRY_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as BANK_EXPIRY_DATE , BANK_VALID_DAYS,bank_active_count,bank_active_limit,bank_expire_count,bank_expire_limit,to_char(BANKER_APPROVE_DATE,'dd-mm-yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as BANKER_APPROVE_DATE from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPL_NO='^' and to_date(to_char(BANKER_APPROVE_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'),'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') < to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS')
select org_level from ORGANISATIONS where ORG_CODE='^'
select BANKER_COMMENTS,BANKER_ORGCODE,BANKER_SANCTIONED_BY,BANKER_SANC_REF_NO,BANKER_BCLC_SANREFNO,BANKER_SANCTIONING_DEPT,BANKER_SANCTIONING_BRANCH from BANKERCERTIFICATE where BANKER_APPL_NO='^'
select nvl(max (ars_sno),0)+1 as ars_sno from APP_REFERNCENUMBER_BANKER where ARS_ORG_LEVEL='^' and ars_financialyear='^'
update BANKERCERTIFICATE set bank_active_count=?,bank_active_limit=?,bank_expire_count=?,bank_expire_limit=? where BANKER_APPL_NO=?
select BANKER_APPL_NO from BANKERCERTIFICATE where banker_cbs_id='^' and banker_status='PA'
select as_tousrid from APPMAILBOX_BANKER where as_appno='^' and as_toflwpt='9'
update BANKERCERTIFICATE set BANKER_APPID=? where BANKER_APPID=? and banker_status='OP'
